name: We (DON'T) Need Space
description:
Hey there! This is my submission to The MiniJam with the theme Space!
I may or may not have Spaced Out (badum ts) in this theme, i was thinking about the space, and then it ocurred to me, why not do a game about the space between two people?
And with that in mind, i made this endless runner. It's my actually first solo game, and i'm really proud about it, even though it's not that great hahaha.
